description: This all-in-one Mexican breakfast is full of fresh and vibrant flavours, and is good to eat at any time of the day.
name: Huevos Rancheros On Tortilla Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 avocado, halved, stoned, and thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: For the pico de gallo, put the tomatoes, jalapeno, onion, garlic, coriander, and lime juice in a bowl. Season, mix well, and set aside.
In a medium saucepan, gently heat the black beans in their own liquid. Stir in the smoked paprika and chilli flakes, and season well.

Meanwhile, heat the oil in a large, non-stick, heavy-based pan over medium heat. When the oil is hot, place a tortilla in the centre of the pan. Using one-quarter of the grated cheese, make a ring inside the tortilla and crack an egg into the centre, making sure that it is contained within the cheese ring.

Cover and cook for 3–4 minutes until the egg starts to set and the cheese melts, then use a spatula to flip the tortilla along with the egg. Cook for 1–2 minutes for a runny yolk, and 3–4 minutes for a firm yolk. Use a spatula to lift the tortilla and the egg, flipping them egg-side up onto a plate. Clean any cheese from the pan and repeat to make the remaining tortillas.
Remove the black beans from the heat and drain. Serve the tortilla and egg topped with the black beans, pico de gallo, and sliced avocado.
